scripts.update:sw: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='service-worker.js';let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');c=c.replace(/CACHE_NAME = 'classpet-v[^']+'/,\"CACHE_NAME = 'classpet-v\"+Date.now()+\"'\");fs.writeFileSync(f,c);console.log('SW cache version updated')"
scripts.build: npm run update:sw && npm run build:css
